thread.title: Danielle Lloyd hits back at CBB star Nicola McLean in cryptic 'nasty girl' Instagram rant
thread.title_full: Danielle Lloyd hits back at CBB star Nicola McLean in cryptic 'nasty girl' Instagram rant

author: Sophie McCoid
title: Danielle Lloyd hits back at CBB star Nicola McLean in cryptic 'nasty girl' Instagram rant
text:
Celebs Danielle Lloyd hits back at CBB star Nicola McLean in cryptic 'nasty girl' Instagram rant It comes after Nicola slammed Danielle for accusing her of lying about attending her wedding to Jamie O'Hara Share She's had enough (Photo: Channel 5) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Danielle Lloyd has launched a scathing attack on "nasty girls" since her ex-husband's appearance on Celebrity Big Brother . 
The mum-of-three has been forced to constantly defend herself after comments were made on Celebrity Big Brother insinuating she was a gold digger who only married Jamie O'Hara for his money. 
Nicola McClean also blasted the star for claiming she had lied about going to Jamie O'Hara's wedding , saying: "Like I'd really lie. She's Danielle Lloyd, not f***ing Beyonce!" 
Now Danielle has hit back at the haters with a brutally honest Instagram post. Linda Nolan reveals her incredible facelift transformation: It's amazing - I look younger than Coleen now 
The 33-year-old posted a snap that read: "Some people are so broken, they get mad at you for being whole." 
Danielle captioned the post: "I've had so many nasty girls making comments on my life publicly on TV, publications and social media lately when they don't have a clue either what I've been through or the life I now live. Nicola slammed Danielle for calling her a liar (Photo: Rex Features) 
"This is the last comment I will be making on the whole situation as I feel like it's playground stuff and am not back at school am a grown woman! 
"I pray for these people that they can get the help I did to find myself and make me a better happier person. 
"Am no angel and you live and learn by your past mistakes and life experiences but am just trying to be the best mum I can be to my 3 wonderful kids," she added. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
